overview: GALYA 40 an drink ,pugnacious pimp in an Omsk village bordering Kazakhstan.She is deprived of her rights to her daughter ZOY (8) and documents are collected in order to send the child to an orphanage.Galya steals her daughter, and together with her autistic boyfriend STASI-KOM (40), they are sent on smuggling routes to Kazakhstan.
title: Zoy’s Return
